referenceObject.reference: Ponomarev, A. V., Mikhailov, K. G. & Shmatko, V. Y. (2024b). Review of the spider genus Zora C.L. Koch, 1847 (Aranei: Miturgidae) of Ciscaucasia and the Russian Caucasus.
